thread.title: BRIEF-North Energy Acquires Additional Securities Of Touchstone Exploration Inc

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-North Energy Acquires Additional Securities Of Touchstone Exploration Inc

organizations.name: brief-north energy acquires additional securities of touchstone exploration inc

text:
06 AM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-North Energy Acquires Additional Securities Of Touchstone Exploration Inc Reuters Staff 
Jan 26 (Reuters) - North Energy Asa: 
* NORTH ENERGY ACQUIRES ADDITIONAL SECURITIES OF TOUCHSTONE EXPLORATION INC. 
* ON JANUARY 18 PURCHASED 150,000 COMMON SHARES OF TOUCHSTONE EXPLORATION INC​ 
* ‍PURCHASED TOUCHSTONE EXPLORATION SHARES AT A PRICE OF GBP £0.125 PER COMMON SHARE (OR CAD $0.216) ​
